item.description:
Not just a workout…an Experience!

 

Come see what everyone’s talking about and what makes a Zumba class with Amy different from all the rest!

With Amy’s over 25 years of experience in the health and fitness industry, you’ll get much more than the average Zumba class: you get a high-energy, motivating, varied and complete mind-body workout that is surprisingly easy to follow and fun to do!

…AND you’ll feel part of the group because at every class and event, you are warmly welcomed into our community of friends no matter what your background, age, fitness level or ability.

So if you’re looking for a way to get fit, feel inspired, increase your energy, make some friends and lose yourself in the hypnotic music…look no further because you found it!

ALL CLASSES OPEN TO THE PUBLIC and for all abilities!


PRICING:
*5-Class Card $40
*10-Class Card: $65 (only $6.50/class!)
$10 Walk-In

(*Class Cards must be used within 4 months of purchase)

Please bring a mat or large towel for Ab work and Stretching at the end of class

…and be sure to “LIKE” “Zumba Dance with Amy” on Facebook for my best diet, exercise and motivational tips and class updates!

 

Wesley Hall at First United Methodist Church

57 Peters St. North Andover, MA 01845

(across from Panera, Burger King and Burton's Grill off 114 and 125) (map)

 

More info and class details at:  www.amyfournierhealthandfitness.com

*Please check online schedule for class changes or cancellations

group.name: The Zumba Dance and Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Zumba
